org.junitee.servlet
Class JUnitEEThreadedServlet

java.lang.Object
  HttpServlet
      org.junitee.servlet.JUnitEEServlet
          org.junitee.servlet.JUnitEEThreadedServlet
public class JUnitEEThreadedServlet
extends JUnitEEServlet

This servlet changes the behaviour of JUnitEEServlet in the way that by default a thread is forked if more than one test suite is to be exectued.

Version:
$Revision: 1.1 $
Author:
Oliver Rossmueller
